title: Online Discussion Board-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Online asynchronous courses for pre-service/in-service teachers to strengthen mathematics education competencies.

learning_goals: Produce educational videos under three minutes explaining mathematical concepts
Design over 10 discussion questions stimulating higher-order thinking skills (analysis, evaluation, creation)
Learners can provide constructive feedback at least three times on peers' video lectures and discussion questions.
Learners can participate in discussions related to mathematics pedagogy on online discussion boards with at least 80% engagement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
